title: Preparing for HTB CPTS Exam
description: Currently preparing for the Hack The Box Certified Penetration Testing Specialist (CPTS) exam to enhance penetration testing skills, through solving practical offensive security labs.

title: Solved "Job" Machine by Hack The Box
description: Solved "Job" machine by Hack The Box, which involved compromising a Windows SMTP server via malicious LibreOffice macros. Escalated to Administrator by abusing IIS webroot write permissions and using SeImpersonate token impersonation.

title: Solved "Manager" Machine by Hack The Box
description: Solved "Manager" machine by Hack The Box, which involved exploiting an Active Directory environment via MSSQL password spraying and credential extraction from backups. Achieved Administrator privileges by abusing AD CS Certificate Authority (ESC7).
